description: Phoenix is a 23 year old who enjoys skateboarding and spending as many hours as possible outdoors.When he's not outside, he's inside working at a local newspaper, proof reading articles before they hit print.You can tell Phoenix likes to stay in-shape. title: Phenix Saint
